text:
Today,
you were meticulously checking everything again.
No, no, I was the one interrupting. My apologies!

─Being a chocolate idol, you know,
it's built up through those kinds of efforts.
Wearing matching costumes, it's obvious, right?

Since everyone's the same, everyone gets the same
credit. We can't rely on the power of the costumes alone.
If the person inside isn't solid, they'll quickly get buried!

So, I have to do everything I can!
That's what it is!
